entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecutionEngineException in WinForms app (Paint.NET) on .NET 8 RC2, which does not occur in .NET 7 (GCStress) #94579
  • [wasm] No deterministic way to produce additional outputs for both building and publishing a WASM project #94576
    9.0.0
  • System.Uri.ToString result is incorrect when combining custom scheme with DOS-style path containing multibyte Unicode character #94572
  • App crashes when running with enabled AOT in .NET 7 Android #94571
  • Stack buffer overrun exception occuring in System.Security.Cryptography #94569
  • GCMemoryInfo.MemoryLoadBytes does not reflect whats inside MEMORYSTATUS #94565
  • Chrome / Chromium 119 Breaks .NET 6.0 Webassembly #94570
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #94561
  • Pinning ROS with known length causes unnecessary code generation. #94559
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Generic overloads of existing TensorPrimitives methods #94553
    9.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement SVE encodings #94549

Closed

  • ElapsedEventArgs doesn't have a public constructor #31204
    9.0.0
  • HashSet.SetEquals() violates symmetric property #94584
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10049): The requested address is not valid in its context. #94430
  • [libraries-pgo] System.Tests.AppDomainTests.AssemblyLoad fails under jitosr_stress_random #93849
    9.0.0
  • Httpclient dns translation should be configurable #92314
  • [7.0] Assertion failed in System.Net.Http.Json.Functional.Tests in ThreadPoolBoundHandle.BindHandleCore in ThreadPoolBoundHandle.Windows.cs:line 14 #94491
    7.0.x
  • Unexpected result for string.IndexOf((char)0, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase) #94556
  • JsonConverter<T>.Write does not respect JsonSerializerOptions parameter #94564
  • Indirect call guard check detected invalid control transfer. #94562
  • [MT][browser] `customAttributeCount` fails #91597
    9.0.0
  • `File.CreateSymbolicLink` required privilege is not held exception even current process is privileged #94551
  • [browser][mt] XmlSystemPathResolverTests.TestResolveInvalidPath timeout #75129
    9.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] [uno] HttpClient calls fail with Unknown converter for type 13 #76063
    9.0.0
  • Timeout in System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests #86019
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow` and `System.Threading.Channels` fail #91593
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `TestCancelAsync` failure #94050
    9.0.0
  • ilverify error messages should better support nested types #93361
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch StandaloneApp6x to pre-built test asset #94590
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • try regMask to unsigned __int128 for linux/arm64 #94589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Avoid generating code for unsupported types in config source gen #94588
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • Do not Path.Join user directory if it's "C:" #94587
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Provide System.Threading.AccessControl package readme #94586
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Threading.RateLimiting package readme #94583
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #94582
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Fix ReadOnlyDictionary and improve DebuggerAttributes #94581
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [docs] Add Mono Library Mode and update Mono Profiled AOT #94578
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94577
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [Android] Improve reliability of SslStream when rejecting remote certificates #94574
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [release/7.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94573
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Sparse conditional propagation in value numbering #94563
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Remove ValueTask interop test placeholders #94560
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Initial patch to fix RISCV64 interpreter #94548
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Merged

  • ElapsedEventArgs: public constructor + sealed #94489
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #94494
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update area-owners.md #94585
    area-Meta
  • Implement StoreVectorNxM for Arm64 #94129
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • improve debuging HTTP/2 tests #94530
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] Fixes use of msvcdis #94550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that a native code version only ever gets one entry point that doesn't change #94542
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Avoid generating code for unsupported types in config source gen #94438
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • JIT: remove `BBF_DONT_REMOVE` from some blocks that can be removed #94532
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94243
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Implement SOS related Debugger API code. #94454
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Proposal to add WasmImportAttribute to control wasm module names #93823
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Add branch label offset to disasm #94512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix Comvariant Failure on s390x #94453
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Merge return true/false blocks #94387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Enable TCValidateAfterAddInvalidSchema.AddValid_Import_Include_Redefine and TC_SchemaSet_Add_URL.v4 for single thread #94558
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Build-mono
  • Merge ServicePoint assembly into Requests #94510
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix test returning 100 unconditionally #94531
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] more testing and cleanup #94466
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] Enable `TestCancelAsync` #94517
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • LSRA: Honor the register aversion decision during allocation #92709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add printing full type name of nested types for ilverify output #94441
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet for some cases #93986
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.1
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement frozen object heap #94515
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #94492
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: cross-block local assertion prop in morph #94363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94478
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94080
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94468
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94401
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #94506
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use live M.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces dependency #94459
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94402
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove [EditorBrowsable(Never)] from [InlineArray], add XML docs #94343
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle null signature destinations for ECDsa / DSA / RSA #93996
    area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • Keep using RO metadata after creating IMetaDataImporter for PDB reading #93760
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/SVE: Add Uzp1 #94529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm64-sve
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #94485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Print finally clone stats with JitTimeLogCsv #94533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a test for determinism #93600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow preinitializing RuntimeType instances #94405
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • add IO.Ports packaging for linux-musl #92145
    area-System.IO.Ports
  • [browser][MT] mono only on deputy testing #94525
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Disallow inlining Main #94449
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • JIT: stop computing dom start nodes for morph RPO #94497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals for small values #93191
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] sidecar testing #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add more gcdump and gcinfo code. #94219
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.DotNet.Installer.Windows.NullInstallerLogger' to type 'Microsoft.DotNet.Installer.Windows.TimestampedFileLogger' #36757
  • HTTP warnings are not raised in dotnet tool scenarios #36756

Closed

  • `dotnet tool update` gives unfriendly error and stack on not found #36557
    8.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Add custom props imports around DB.props import Fixes #36749 #36777
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Update Version.Details.xml #36775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36676
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, DO NOT MERGE, 8.0.2
  • accept bare version as NuGet exact version for .NET tools #36671
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36748
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2312062 #36712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36747
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #35173] `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Find Usages presenter keeps a GC root to a full Solution #70753
  • Need a SourceText.From overload that allows passing a precomputed checksum. #70752
  • When automatically converting an "if" statement into a conditional expression using the C# editor, unintended conversion may occur. #70750
    Backlog
  • Autocomplete jumps the cursor forward around Interpolated strings #70749
  • When I convert an "if" statement containing a checked expression into a conditional expression in the c# editor, it is converted to unintended code. #70748
    Backlog
  • Integration tests should verify no non-fatal errors occurred #70747
  • Integration tests produce assertion failure "Pretty-listing introduced errors in error-free code" #70744
  • Obsolete error should be reported for container class of a collection expression builder class #70742
  • Diagnostics do not work when configured from Solution Explorer #70740

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34309.104 #70754
  • Why does missing class identifier cause skipping parsing members? #30749
    Backlog
  • `SymbolDisplayVisitor` doesn't correctly classify function pointer calling conventions #70746
  • Assert failure in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BoundNode.set_TopLevelNullability #70620
  • Collection expressions: Improve error message for spread element type with no GetEnumerator() method #69745
    17.9
  • It looks like LoweredDynamicOperationFactory.GetReceiverRefKind hasn't been adjusted for ref returns #68063
    17.9
  • Wrong Line numbers are giving in case of / #70636

PullRequests

Created

  • Nullable compound assignment experiment #70751
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Add checksum validation to track down issue #70745
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix commit behvaior where items use default commit chars as their special filter char #70743
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Removed incorrect parenthesis from file Update Scripting-API-Samples.md #70741
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Properly parse members in type declarations missing an identifier #69798
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Implement textDocument/prepareRename for better rename experience #70724
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: report specific error for spread with no GetEnumerator() method #70717
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Null annotate ArgumentNames. #70739
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Handle ref returning receivers in dynamic calls #70676
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid some first-chance exceptions by returning instead #70695
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the old integration test projects #70716
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revise compound assignment for nullable #70687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Change checksums into structs #70245
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • WIP #70714
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to Xxhash128 from sha256 #70723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include syntax error in Hot Reload diagnostics reported to dotnet watch #70540
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add perf benchmarks for Blazor Web scenarios #51971
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Cascading Parameter that transfers across render boundaries #51969
  • [Blazor] AddInteractiveWebAssemblyComponents() should register LazyAssemblyLoader or a similar type. #51966
    Planning: WebUI
  • HostFilteringMiddleware. It is returning "The host '{Host}' does not match an allowed host." time to time. #51960
  • MapRazorComponents fails if you don't have wwwroot #51957
    Planning: WebUI
  • Root component can't do streaming SSR #51956
    Planning: WebUI
  • CascadingParameter set in MainLayout.razor doesn't work as expected in .NET 8 #51955
  • Perf regression: caching, mvc, updates #51953
  • Blazor Identity Pages - Inifnite Redirect Loop when adding second external provider #51950
    8.0.x

Closed

  • False positive: ASP0022: Route '/' conflicts with another handler route (.NET 8 RC2) #51285
    9.0-preview1
  • Proposal solution for HostFilteringMiddleware issue connected to IOptionsManager OnChange method #51970
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #51946
  • ASP0023 Ambiguous route warning when targeting .NET 8 and using token [action] or [controller] in [Http*] or [Route] attributes #49777
    8.0.x
  • Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button `formmethod` attribute #51940
    Planning: WebUI
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json #51931
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, single_query #51945
  • Creating a new component using `dotnet new razorcomponent` uses the directory name as the default file name #11824
    Backlog
  • InputDate with Type=InputDateType.Time and step=1 doesn't accept keyboard input #38471
    Planning: WebUI
  • Back action behavior is different in Blazor Server (server-side) and Blazor WebAssembly (client-side) #39172
    Backlog
  • Misleading documentation for UseBlazorFrameworkFiles("path") #48950
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Blazor template issues with Google Authentication [dotnet 8 rc2] #51402
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • System.ObjectDisposedException: Cannot access a disposed object (IServiceProvider) #51460
  • CacheOutput hides exceptions in Minimal APIs in .NET 8 RC2 #51757
  • Reject Data on @OnChange event on a textbox. #51733

PullRequests

Created

  • Override IOQueueCount via env vars #51964
    area-networking
  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery

Merged

  • Dispose secret instances #51253
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Update HelpWantedProcess.md #51967
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Mark API from 8 as shipped #51948
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with action replacement #51880
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, analyzer, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix "Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button `formmethod` attribute" #51942
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Quarantine another one of the CanRenderComponentWithPersistedState cases #51808
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with switch #51881
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Improve path search in Kestrel parsing #51535
    Perf, feature-kestrel, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7e33b6a` to `b10fad3` #51801
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.13
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `68cd408` to `2c27dd2` #51802
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.13
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51616
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.13
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e47544a` to `b10fad3` #51800
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51612
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.24
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `1d1834b` to `99a804e` #51799
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • [release/6.0] Skip failing template tests on Win11-arm64 #51311
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • Mark API from 8.0 as shipped #51947
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51812
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Update DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement doc comment #51490
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Avoid requiring ProblemDetailsService when IExeptionHandler is used #51898
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • androidx.collection.ArrayMapKt is defined multiple times #18665
  • LinearGradientBrush spills outside BoxView background. #18664
  • Lightweight Virtualized Items Control #18662
  • Wifi Adapter Controls #18661
  • Maui android Release apk crash in .NET7 #18659
  • .NET 9: Make .NET MAUI trimmer-friendly #18658
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] CollectionView.EmptyView can not be removed by setting it to Null #18657
  • Image Control Loses Image on Page Navigation in Android #18656
  • Button with ImageSource doesn't render correctly when initially hidden #18655
  • Shell does not provide way to change TabBar properties such as font size, family. #18653
    Backlog
  • iOS Application crashes on startup when built through Azure pipeline #18652
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D4 #18647
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [MAUI]Enabling Remove Animations won't make both labels (Label 1, Label 2) fully visible immediately. #18644
  • Image blinks when imagesource connected to mpeg stream #18642
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.2.9530] Completely broken virtualization in CollectionView #18639

Closed

  • Emoji Issue on Windows #15077
  • MAUI iOS .NET 7 + EFCore 7.0.0 doesn't work #11513
    Backlog
  • Make MAUI Trimming Safe #1962
    Backlog
  • [iOS] MAUI project won't build with the 8.0.0-rc.2.9530 version on Azure Pipeline #18632
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D3 #18645
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Access denied error when deploy .net maui app by msix on windows #10010
    Backlog
  • Some generated code falls foul of code analyzers. #12196
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test B1 (ScrollView) #18651
  • slow rendering collectionview #18460
  • Screenshot dont work on IOS views #18435
  • .NET MAUI iOS App (Release mode) not working with CoreWCF service. #13840
  • NU1202 Package Microsoft.Maui.Graphics 7.0.86 is not compatible with net7.0-android #16009
    Backlog
  • Unable to add an image to a MAUI app project and build it #16089
  • MAUI sample program cannot enter debugging, no errors, getting stucked #16998

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Stepper` #18663
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Add benchmarking class for PropertyMapper extensions #18660
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D4 #18650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.7.2 to 17.8.0 #18641
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D3 #18649
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.2088.41 to 1.0.2151.40 #18599
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fixed issue creating Paths with PolyLineSegment without points #18643
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [net8.0] Revert "Ensure that viewport calculations for iOS ScrollView account … #18646
  • [Tizen] Update TizenUIExtensionsVersion #18442
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18638
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Arrange content based on arrangement bounds rather than viewport bounds #18586

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EntityFrameworkCore 6.0.24 and 7.0.13 fails Scaffolding for data objects that have two primary keys as the Primary Clustered Key #32271
  • Timestamp doesn't work when the property value is updated in code #32270
  • JsonValueReaderWriter.FromJsonString doesn't seem to correctly parse #32269
  • DB Context pooling with proxies resulting in memory issues in 8.0 RC2 #32267
  • Migrations for default configurations are generated in wrong order #32264
  • Error CS8103 : Combined length of user strings used by the program exceeds allowed limit. Try to decrease use of string literals. #32261

Closed

  • No idea how to make a simple migration using the source code #32256
  • How to Use EF Core Transactions With ASP.NET Core Identity Methods? #32263
  • SQLite ignored conversion when using ExecuteUpdateAsync #32252

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Visit arguments in QueryableMethodNormalizingExpressionVisitor after converting List.Contains (#32219) #32266
  • [release/8.0] Contains nullability processing #32265

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32259
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32258
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • After installing the latest .Net 9.0 SDK version, the target is still 8.0 when creating Winforms applications via CLI #17744

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #17754

  • Update branding to 8.0.101 #17719

  • NGEN Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver.dll and its dependencies #17732
